text_block_list.text: <chrname> seems to have suffered a minor injury…
However, we are in the middle of the precious Summer Camp. Now, what should I do—
choice_data_list: Make sure she takes a break

text_block_list.text: I decided to make sure that she would focus on her treatment.
<chrname> couldn't move her body and felt a little down…
I decided to give <chrname> some encouragement and tried to continue on—
But it failed! The injury seems to have gotten worse…
Then, miraculously, her injury healed completely, and practice went well!
